column1: length ball outside off stump, and angling in from round the wicket. Defended
slider on off stump, and he stays on the back foot to defend. Tapped away to the leg side
full on middle, and drifting into his legs. Flicked off his pads to deep midwicket, and Carey has enough time to jog back for the second
tossed up on middle stump, slightly more air on offer from Nabi. Driven down the ground past the non-striker to long on
full outside off, and spinning away from the left-hander. Tapped away to cover with gentle hands
good length ball on off, and drifting inwards. Nurdled off his pads to the vacant mid-wicket region for a single. A tidy over from the Renegades - as it often is - to start off the game

full outside off stump, and he sticks his bat out to defend. Played with the bat's open face, and it beats point. They need to hurry for the final run after a rocket-throw from the deep, but the batsmen manage to scurry back for the third
full on off, and coming into his pads. Stump-to-stump bowling, and Weatherald clips this away to square leg
full just outside off, and he crunches a cover drive through the infield! Once it beats the fielder, the ball continues to generate pace up until it rattles the boundary-rope skirting
length ball outside off, and he shuffles onto the back foot to defend. Struck to cover
length ball outside off, and angling in with the arm. Drops his length after that cover drive for four, and Weatherald's happy to defend off the back foot
good length on middle, and he flicks the incoming delivery behind square on the leg side
full on middle, and defended off the front foot. Back to the bowler and he scoops the ball up on his followthrough

full and wide outside off, Weatherland squirts a square drive to point and the fielder at point dives to his right to take a catch! But did Weatherald jam the ball onto the ground or did it go to the fielder on the full? Replays say he's chopped it right onto the deck
full on off, and angling away from Weatherald. Looks to drive through the covers, but he misses the shot completely
full on leg stump, and his front-foot defense takes the outside edge to fly away to point. Through to Dan Christian on the bounce
length ball outside off, and angling into the batsman. Nudged off the back foot to deep midwicket. First run of the over

mix-up! And that's what happens when you're starved of the strike. Back of a length ball on off, and Carey taps this to mid off. Weatherald isn't interested in the run while Carey's almost reached the other end. The throw from mid off is wonky, and Ludeman does well to jump up and grab the ball. Thereafter, he quickly whips the bails off to send Carey back for only five!
full on his toes, and clipped in front of square past the fielder at midwicket! Great wristwork, solid bottom hand to whip the ball away
full on leg stump, and firmly defended off the front foot to Richardson
full outside off, and angling away. Tries to play an expansive cover drive and misses
full outside off again, slightly slower this cutter. Looks to drive again, and the ball goes past his outside edge once more
overpitched on off, almost a yorker. Tries to drive, but he can only toe-end it to cover

and it nearly goes straight to him! Length ball on middle, and almost squares him up. Tries to defend, but it takes a thick outside edge, and flies through the vacant second-slip region for four. Yikes
full on off, and clipped into the gap behind square on the leg side. Deep backward square cleans up in the deep
full and wide outside off, and he check-drives through the covers. Drops just in front of Cameron White, and he slides across the ground to intercept. Saves a certain boundary
full on off, and he shuffles across to the off side, before tapping it gently to mid on
goes short, but doesn't aim the ball well. Ingram swivels to pull, and hits it towards the man at backward square leg
good length on off, and he works it away - off his hips - to deep midwicket

full on middle, and he backs away to free some shackles. Swings away over mid off, but it's come off the bat's toe end. Nabi runs back from mid-on, and sticks one hand out while running towards the boundary, but the ball hits his hand and almost runs away into the boundary! Nabi does well to recover and parry the ball back, while a second fielder cleans up his effort. Goes down as a dropped chance but that was mighty difficult
low full toss on middle, and that's been squeezed away to cover after an attempted drive
full and wide outside off, and Ingram throws his hands at this. Looks to drive over cover, but he slices it over point instead
slower ball, full on off, and Ingram tries to muscle this over mid off. Deceived by the 112kph delivery, and he slices the shot right over short third man! Living dangerously here
full on middle, and Ingram tees off finally! Swings across the line, and thumps a pulled shot over wide long on
full and straight, and Ingram offers the bat's full face to drive past the bowler. Mid on does well to intercept near the ring
full on leg stump, again slower from Richardson. Tapped away to midwicket as Strikers earn 40 off the Powerplay
length ball outside off, and he tries to cut behind square. Straight to point
length ball on leg stump, and nudged off the back foot to square leg
full outside off, and an expansive cover drive beats the infield! Minimal spin, and the extra width allows him to slap this away
full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to the leg side for a single

big appeal for caught-behind, and that's been given! Nabi really slows this delivery, going wide outside off. Ingram tees up to smash this through the covers, but he's through the shot early and the outside edge is pocketed by the keeper
length ball outside off stump. He stays on the back foot, and cuts to backward point for one
back of a length outside off, and firmly punched off the back foot to mid off
beauty from Wildermuth. Extra bounce after landing on a length outside off. He tries to punch away from his body, but the ball whizzes past his outside edge

full on leg stump, and he check-slogs through to the leg side! Wide long-on runs to his left to try and take a catch, but the ball hits the boundary-rope skirting on the full. Third umpire will decide this shot's fate, and yep, that's two runs less because the ball landed just before
length ball outside off, and angling further away. He frees his arms, and slaps a cut-shot through to deep point
back of a length outside off stump, and Short - he's very tall by the way - swivels to smack this towards deep midwicket
hammered! Right into the second tier. In the slot on middle stump, and Weatherald swings through the ball's line to absolutely clatter a maximum into cow corner. Oof
half-tracker on middle, and he flat-bats a pull to long on
full on leg stump, and carefully tapped away to the leg side. Midwicket runs forward to intercept
backs away to make some room, and the ball lands full on leg stump. Weatherald slaps a cut shot after exposing all three stumps to deep point
length ball outside off, and Short skips down the ground. Drives past the non-striker to long on
tossed up on leg, and he goes to slog sweep behind square. Top-edges the shot, and Nabi gets under it in the deep! Nabi displaying some safe hands, and Strikers' Anchor-man is gone
half-tracker on off, and that's the perfect delivery for Short. Rocks back really deep inside the crease, and pulls this right over cow corner! Off the bat's sweet spot
soft appeal for caught behind but not given. Length ball outside off, and Wells looks to cut his first ball. Misses
length ball on leg stump, and going further down
full outside off stump, and Jono Wells drives firmly through to cover. Calls early for the single, and they scamper across for one
length ball outside off, and he skips down the wicket to drive the ball to the leg side. Inside-edges the shot to midwicket
good length just outside off, and fended off the back foot to mid-on. No run on offer
full on middle, but he stays on a leg-side stance to drive inside-out past the bowler's left to mid off
length ball angling down leg, and he flicks it after shuffling across the stumps. Protection at deep fine-leg though
full and wide outside off stump, and he opens his arms to drive through the covers. Finds the only infielder on the off side
slower ball, but wide outside off stump. Steers a late cut to deep point off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and he flat-bats a pull shot. Dragged to wide long on
full and wide outside off stump, and he slaps a square drive. But finds the infielder once again
bowls again in that wide channel outside off, and Wells squirts a late cut to deep point once more
slow, but a yorker on off stump. Digs this away well with the angled bat, played to point for no run
wrong'un to start the over. Length ball on off, but spinning inwards, and he rocks back to pull towards cow corner for a single
full on off, and driven against the turn to long on for a walking single
length ball on middle, and he once again flat-bats a pull to long on. Renegades would love this
full on off stump, and the batsman's on the back foot. The ball hurries onto him, and he taps this off the back foot to mid on
full on middle, and skidding inwards. Wells goes towards the leg side to meet the ball, and taps it back to Boyce off the back foot
length ball, wide outside off, and he makes room to cut square. Good timing off the blade, but no placement
short ball, but slow too. Matt Short skipped down the wicket, and he's surprised by the change up. Tries to nudge it fine past third man, but can't make any contact
attempts a yorker, but it ends up as a low full toss on off stump. Steered away with the bat's open face to deep point
full on middle, and driven down the ground to long on
low full toss just outside off, and he tries to smash this towards the leg side. Hit well, but to the right of the fielder manning long-on
back of a length outside off, and he allows the ball to come onto his body, before pulling square to K Smith at deep midwicket. Lands just short
yorker just outside off, and all Wells can do is jam a wedged drive down to mid on
full on off stump, and he skips down the ground before driving to long off with the bat's straight face
full on leg stump, and he muscles an inside-out drive past the bowler's left. Wide long-off runs to his right to stop the ball, but his diving effort just isn't good enough!
tossed up outside off stump, and this time he crunches a cover drive through the infield! Long on and deep extra cover try to congregate, but the ball beats both men! Just what Strikers needed
length ball on middle, and he rocks back to pull. Struck hard to cow corner
full and fast outside off stump. Driven to long off after walking down the ground
half-tracker outside off, and he makes room to cut behind square. Man on the boundary though
slower ball, but full outside off stump. He tees up to slog towards the on-side but mistimes the shot to wide long on. Team hundred
low full toss outside off, and he squeezes a square drive to deep point. Played so gently that they have enough time to jog back for the second run
back of a length outside off, and slapped - after skipping down the ground - to deep extra cover
full ball wide outside off stump, but Short walks across off stump to expose all stumps, and then uses his wrists to nonchalantly flick this over deep backward square! Exquisite
nice comeback. Slower, length ball outside off. Tries to muscle this over point with the width, but misses the shot

into the big boundary! Oh, what a shot. This man really has some big biceps. Full just outside off, and he settles in for a big shot. Clears the front leg, opens up his leg side, and then thumps a slogged shot over mid wicket! Over a 100 metres, would you believe it
full outside off stump, and driven towards cover with gentle hands
shouts of 'catch it', but falls in front of long off. Back of a length ball outside off, and his attempted flat-batted pull is sliced over the bowler's head
pierces the infield! Length ball outside off, and he uses the depth of the crease to steer a square cut between point and cover point
length ball outside off, but the googly comes into him. Plays a deft late cut to short third man
full on leg stump, and nicely whipped away to deep midwicket. Just a single though
thick outside edge! Length ball spinning inwards, and the square cut comes off the bat's shoulder. Edged past short third-man, who has no choice but to give the ball a chase
full outside off, and he swings across the line to mistime a shot towards deep midwicket
full and wide outside off stump. Lines up to smash this over the bowler's head, but the ball beats the bat's face. Through to Ludeman. Short will be disappointed
full and slow outside off, and he carves an uppish drive over the infield. Drops just short of deep extra cover
full just outside off stump. Short walks across towards the off side, and drills this straight to long on
full and wide outside off, but he goes down on one knee to crunch a square drive through the infield! Played with the bat's angled bat, and deep extra cover had absolutely no chance
slower ball, but it's slipped out of his hand! The ball's ballooned over the batsman's head, and he tries to pull this away to fine leg. Inside-edges the shot onto the deck, and that's a free hit
full and wide outside off, and he walks towards the pitch of the ball, before chipping a shot over midwicket
full on middle, and that's straight as an arrow! Clears his front leg, exposes middle stump, and then lifts it right over the bowler's head for six. Terrific shot
Short skips down the ground and meets a high full toss halfway down the wicket. Pulls to the leg side, but mistimed to the man in the deep

clattered off the back foot, and over Boyce's head, but a committed effort from Christian at long off saves the boundary. Was a short ball on off, and the batsman tried to hammer this straight. Half century for the man
full outside off stump, and he swings across the line after settling down on one knee. Stopped at long on
full outside off, and driven down the ground to long on for a walking single
full on middle, and he skips down the ground to slog. The shot comes off the bat's inside half, and dribbles away to deep midwicket
cheeky! Full outside off, and he walks across the stumps, before ramping a scoop over short fine leg!
full outside off stump, but he walks across towards the off side once more, before flicking this with his bottom hand over the square-leg umpire for another biggie
full and wide outside off, and he throws his bat at it. Sliced to third man on the bounce
slower ball, full just outside off stump. Tapped off the front foot to the bowler's right
a well-directed yorker. Wide outside off, and wedged away to point with gentle hands for a single
full outside off, and slapped in front of square on the off side. Deep extra cover has a lot of work to do, but he parries the ball back and aims a rocket-throw to the keeper
back of a length outside off, but he takes the pace off this delivery. Short skips down the ground to try and go across the line, but the ball sneaks under his bat
slower ball again, on a length outside off stump. But Short shuffles across to the off side, and mistimes a pull to deep backward square

yorker! And that ends Strikers' highest-ever fourth-wicket stand. Aimed at the base of leg stump, and Wells shuffles across to try and flick. The ball beats his boot, and clips the outside of leg stump to give Richardson some reward
full on middle, and that's been hammered first ball! Front-leg cleared, and swung across the line. First-ball six over deep midwicket for Lehmann
full outside off, and he slaps a cover drive to White at cover. Misfield allows them to pinch a single

brilliant caught-and-bowled effort by Richardson! Back of a length outside off, and the attempted pull has been sliced in the air. Richardson runs towards mid-on, and puts in a big dive to earn another wicket for himself
full just outside leg stump, and driven down the ground. Short intercepts
full on off, and he skips down the wicket, before whipping a shot to deep midwicket
length ball on leg stump, and angling across the right-hander. Pulled to deep midwicket to get off the mark
full outside off stump, but Harper walks across his stumps - exposing all three wickets - and then slog-sweeps right over deep backward square! Ingenious
full and wide outside off, and he tries to play the reverse paddle. But misses the shot
full outside off, and he skips down the ground. Swings through the ball's line, and he's got enough behind that shot to clear long on! Excellent first over for the Gades
full on of, and he drives towards the leg side on this occasion. The ball flies off the bat's inside half, and the ball races away for four after beating the sliding midwicket fielder
length ball outside off, and he scampers across to the side before flicking past short fine leg. Enough time to pinch the second run
length ball on off, and he tries to steer a pull towards the leg side. Hits the bat's top half, and almost carries to midwicket
back of a length outside off, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
full on off, and he shuffles across to try and paddle a shot past the keeper's left. But Neser's slower ball deceives Harper, and the batsman isn't pleased with his effort
length ball outside off, and zipping inwards sharply. Harper tries to work it towards the leg side, but it takes the top of his pad and runs down to third man. Soft lbw shout from Neser
Stanlake strikes first ball! Another batting failure for Ludeman. 143 kph from him, and the ball wasn't in the slot to be hit. Drives through his length ball, and he slices the catch to mid off
length ball outside off, and that's a classy way to get off the mark! Back of a length outside off, and he carves a back-foot cut beating the man at third man

short and wide outside off, and White rides the bounce before slashing a hard cut shot over deep point! Third man was running around the boundary in a bid to try and take a difficult catch, but the ball just floated beyond the boundary for six more
full just outside off, and he times a drive well through the off side. Mid off slides across the ground to intercept

full outside off stump, and Harper exposes all three stumps before trying to whip behind square. Misses the shot, and the ball hits his pads, but impact is way outside the stumps. Nobody bothers appealing

shout for caught behind but the umpire isn't interested. Length ball outside off that he tried to play towards the leg side, but the ball flies past the outside of his bat, nicks his back leg, and then falls into Carey's gloves
carved! Full and wide outside off, and White uses his bat like a katana to smash a square drive over point
full on middle, and he walks down the ground, before tapping it away to mid on
length ball going down leg, and he nudges it off his pads to short fine leg. Could be a tight run, but eventually it's easily completed
slower ball, full on leg and going into his pads. Tries to muscle a shot towards the leg side, but misses. Hits his legs, but impact is down leg
length ball on the fourth-stump line, and he swivels to pull. Mistimed to deep midwicket for a walking single

short outside off, but with the pace taken off it. White waits for the delivery to get to him, before plundering a pull shot behind square. Beats the square-leg umpire, and also the outstretched hands of the diving deep-midwicket fielder!
full on off, and he steps across the line, before whipping this away over square leg to earn a first-ball four!
back of a length on middle, and the ball flies over the batsman's head. Sharp take by the keeper
full on middle, and he backs away to lift a shot over mid off. But the ball jags away after hitting the deck, and takes an outside edge over slip instead!
good length outside off, and carved off the back foot to deep point
great bowling! Stanlake saw Harper backing away, and so he follows the batsman. Aims a yorker outside leg stump, and that's been bunted away rather uncomfortably by the batsman
back of a length on off, and he waits for the ball to get to him, before pulling to deep backward square
full and wide outside off, and driven away from his body to cover. Mistimed
length ball outside off, and skidding through straight. White tries to defend thinking it's the wrong'un, but the ball goes through to the keeper
full outside off, and he sticks his bat out to defend towards point. Harper's halfway down the wicket already before White sends him back.Neser's wayward throw over Rashid's head saves the Renegades
googly outside off stump, but spinning into his body. Tapped off the back foot towards midwicket
full just outside off, and turned with the spin to deep midwicket for a walking single
half-tracker outside off, and skidding through once again. White tiptoes to cut this square with the extra bounce, but the ball goes over his bat. Sharp take from Carey. End of the Powerplay
back of a length outside off, and Harper shapes up to pull. Top-edged right over the keeper, but fine leg comes forward to stop the ball
length ball outside off, and jagging inwards after hitting the deck. Defended off the back foot
length ball just outside off stump. Probably too close for the cut, but he steers it to third man anyway
length ball outside off, and he crunches a cut off the back foot. But it's been hit straight to deep point
full and wide outside off, and he shapes up to play a late cut. Hit straight to short third man, but they're taking the fielder's arm on! Easily done in the end
whoa! Beamer that forces White to duck under the ball. Ball skips out of his hand, White takes cover and the ball goes to Carey on the bounce
full and wide outside off stump, but White does well to open the bat's face towards point and then driving up and over point. Chase for deep extra cover, and he can't pull it back
full on off, and nudged off his toes to midwicket
slower ball, full on leg stump. White tried to flick this fine past the keeper for four, but the ball is stopped sharply by Carey
full on leg stump, and tapped with soft hands to deep midwicket. Not enough time to take the second run though
wide ball outside off, and Harper frees his arms to crunch a square cut to deep point
length ball on middle, and getting into White's body. Uncomfortably tapped to long on, and that allows White to take the second run
overpitched on middle stump, and he muscles a straight drive down the ground. Long-on runs to his left to intercept, but they come back for the second anyway

appeal, and given! Length ball on off, and the googly comes into the stumps. Harper misses the flick, and the ball has hit him in front of middle stump. Easy decision for the ump as Rashid goes celebratin'
full on leg stump, and he mistimes a leg-side flick. Hits his pads and rolls away to square leg
length ball on middle, and spinning away from the left-hander. Goes down on one knee to sweep, and mistimed to the fielder in the deep
full and wide outside off, and tapped away off the front foot to point
length ball outside off, and the skidder is played with deft hands by White. Late cut finds short third man

slow finger of death from the umpire! Second wicket in the over for Rashid, and it's the dangerous White who must go. Full outside off, and spins into White. Impact with the pad is right on off stump, and the umpire raises his finger after quite a lot of deliberation
length ball outside off stump, and cut off the back foot to deep point

full on middle, and he chips this right into midwicket's hands! You wouldn't get an easier catch than that, and that's a maiden BBL wicket for Valente. Closed the bat's face too early, and the captain Cooper goes for a duck
yorker on middle, and Nabi squeezes this away to the leg side. Can't get off the mark though
length ball outside off, and he tries to defend off the back foot. Takes the outside edge and flies away to third man
length ball outside off, and the slower ball angles into Nabi. Nudged off the back foot to square leg
full outside off, and he sticks his bat out to fend away. Played gently to point. Valente's over earns him a round of applause from the home crowd
full outside leg stump, and clipped off his pads to deep backward square
length ball outside off, and the legspinner goes away from Nabi. Tries to cut square, but misses. Wry smile from Rashid
good length outside off, and a flashy cut shot goes to point on the bounce. Could've easily gone straight to the fielder too
full on off, and skidding through. Nabi covers his off stump by walking across, and defends with soft hands
flighted full outside off, and Nabi has chosen to go for the big shot! Swings through the ball's line, and he hammers Rashid's first poor delivery over the fielder at long on
length ball outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover. Quicker ball from Rashid

full outside off, and he tries to drive through the covers. The ball's angling away from Smith, and the edge has gone straight into Carey's gloves! You don't get easier catches than that. Poor footwork from Smith, and the extra pace doesn't help his cause either
full on leg stump, and driven down the ground to mid-on. Wants to get off the mark, but can't beat the infield
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to try and cut the ball over point. Except he can't make any contact
full just outside off, and he mistimes a cover drive to mid off. The ball dribbles away to the fielder as Christian calls for the single
back of a length outside off stump, and he spreads his legs to try and muscle a powerful shot over point. Under-edges the shot right into the pitch

muscled over deep midwicket! Short ball outside off from Stanlake, but Nabi stays on the back foot and punishes the bowler in front of square. Not easy playing that to a man whose running in at 145kph
length ball just outside off, and too close to his body for the cut. Through to the keeper
full and wide outside off, and he muscles a square drive through to deep point for a single
pounded! Full ball, but very wide too, and Nabi walks towards the off side and then slaps a square cut through to the boundary. Deep extra cover had no chance there
length ball outside off, and tapped with soft hands towards cover. They scurry across for one
full and wide outside off, but the ball goes just beyond the tramlines. Christian offers no shot and collects the wide-run instead
overpitched wide outside off, and he crunches a cover drive through the infield. Man in the deep though

the extra ball goes for six! Full toss on off stump, and Christian has already exposed all three stumps to clear the leg side. Right in the slot for him, and he pulls this away from near his waist to deep backward square leg
full on leg stump, and nudged away to the vacant midwicket region.
full on middle, and he shovels a straight drive past the bowler's right to long on
length ball outside leg stump, cramping Nabi for room. Tapped away to cover
full on leg stump, and he's in position early to sweep this behind square. Beats the diving short fine-leg fielder but deep backward square manages to stop the boundary
full outside leg again, and this time the sweep goes to the fielder manning the boundary
over long off! Full on leg stump, but Christian backed away, and the ball landed just in front of his bat. Swings it like a golf club, and the mistimed shot has enough to beat the fielder at long off
slower ball, full outside off stump. Tapped away to point for a quick single
full and wide outside off, and he crunches a cover drive through the infield! Beats the sliding fielder at cover, but Rashid at wide long off does very well to stop the boundary
full and wide outside off stump, and he tries to muscle a cover drive. But the bat hits the ground, and the ball flies through him to Carey
length ball outside off stump, and Christian allows the ball to come to him, before flat-batting a shot over the bowler's head for six more. Long-on was just a spectator
low full toss on middle, and he muscles a mistimed drive to long on
full just outside off, and Nabi slices a lofted shot to Rashid at long off. He has to hurry for the second, but he manages to eventually complete it without diving in
full on leg stump, and nudged away gently to square leg. Just a single though

full on leg stump, but Nabi skips down the ground and lifts the ball straight down long-on's throat! But Neser makes a mess of the catch with the ball dipping away from him, and the ball rolls away for four after the dropped catch
full on middle, and bunted back to the bowler. No run
length ball outside off, and flicked away to deep backward square for a comfortable double
full toss on middle stump, and he bunts a shot away to wide long on. Christian wants the second run, and he has to hurry... but the players make it with ease!
length ball on off, and he flicks this very fine! Allows the ball to go past his hips, before he gets some bat to place the ball right between the keeper and short fine leg!
length ball on middle, and tapped back to Rashid off the front foot
it's a skidder outside off. Length ball outside the stumps, and he misses the cut shot
length ball on off, and spinning into his body. Nudged away to square leg for a walking single
half-tracker outside off, and he toe-ends a pull to wide long on
tossed up just outside off, and pushed to cover. Christian wants the single, but there's none there
length ball outside off, and he cuts despite the extra bounce. Lands just in front of point! Rashid finishes with 2 for 13
good length outside off, and the slower ball takes some extra bounce. Looks to muscle a cut shot over point, but he misses it completely
yorker on leg stump, but Nabi natmegs this between his legs to deep backward square. A well-directed yorker from the experienced Laughlin
good length outside off, and he plays a square cut very hard! Ball races away to the boundary, and deep extra's sliding effort can't stop it off either
full and wide outside off, and he mistimes a square drive to deep extra cover once again
slower ball, but overpitched on middle stump. He swings across the line, and muscles a drive to wide long-on
low full toss on middle, and Nabi hits this over to deep midwicket. Off the bat's toe end, and that allows them to take the second run
unlucky for Stanlake! Pinpoint yorker on leg stump, but the ball hits the heel of his boot and flies away into the fine-leg boundary! oooh, this is bad for Strikers
that's outta here! Lands in the slot on off stump, and Christian simply clears his front leg, and then lets his biceps do the rest. Absolutely clattered over deep midwicket, and we need a new ball!
Short! And Christian can't pull this away. Extra pace forces him to play the shot late, and Carey takes a sharp take from near his face. Could've easily been top-edged over the keeper though
slower ball, full and wide outside off, and Christian completely misses the shot! Looks to smack the leather off this delivery, but he was through his shot way too early

check-drive over long off! Again full outside off, and the pace only helps Christian. Keeps his back leg rooted on the ground and transfers his energy forward as he pulverises a six over the bowler's head
full on off stump, and this has been slogged towards midwicket! Lands just between midwicket and long-on, and goes into the boundary on the bounce. Stanlake concedes 20

there it is! A hug between Nabi and Christian signifies what this means to them. Back of a length outside off, and Nabi slices a cut from near his body, and it has enough power to go into the third-man boundary. Renegades win by five wickets
